content.rendered: For Snake River Towing, we wanted to go with a very basic image based layout that would work well for mobile searches and fast internet look up’s. Snake River Towing has dominated the search results by showing up first on the 10 pack, 3rd organically (still moving up) and 1st for pay per click. They have picked up a large amount of freeway break down’s for their advertising online.
